name: fold-unity-github-diff
description: chrome extension to fold diff of Unity specified files on GitHub

scripts.build: bower install && bower update && psc --ffi 'bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.js'   'bower_components/purescript-*/src/**/*.purs'    src/Main.purs  && psc-bundle output/*/*.js   --module Main --main Main -o dist/script.js   && cp   src/manifest.json  dist/  && cp   src/contentscript.js  dist/
scripts.build-cmd: bower install && bower update && psc --ffi  bower_components\purescript-*\src\**\*.js bower_components\purescript-*\src\**\*.purs src\Main.purs && psc-bundle output\*\*.js --module Main --main Main -o dist\script.js && copy src\manifest.json dist\ && copy src\contentscript.js dist\

author: Kazuki Okamoto
